scripts.relay: get-graphql-schema https://coqzo.herokuapp.com/graphql > schema.graphql && relay-compiler --src ./src/ --exclude '**/.next/**' '**/node_modules/**' '**/test/**'  '**/__generated__/**' --exclude '**/schema/**' --schema schema.graphql --language typescript --customScalars.ISO8601DateTime=String --artifactDirectory ./src/__generated__
